title: american horror story freakshow - Ethel tells edward mordrake her darkest shame
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: To some extent Mordrake is warm and compassionate
Kathy Bates is an insane actress. In Coven she made me absolutely hate her. In Freak Show she made my heart break.

It was nice to see Edward Mordrake reveal his soft side as he listened to her story; it shows that even with the fate he was given, he still had empathy for those who - like him - were labeled freaks, and suffered through no fault of their own.
Kathy Bates deserved that emmy, I don't even know who won that year
Bates is obviously great, but Bentley nailed these scenes as Mordrake. His non-verbal acting was perfect.
description:
american horror story  freak show - Ethel tells edward mordrake her darkest shame 
4x3 Edward Mordrake part 1
